judge_name.description: name of the judge presiding over the case (e.g., arshall J.)

plaintiff.description: name of the first person or entity who initiates a lawsuit or legal action(if there are multiple plaintiffs, extract only the first one mentioned; e.g., Cairnsmore Holdings Pty Ltd)

defendant.description: name of the first person or entity being sued or accused (if there are multiple defendants, extract only the first one mentioned; e.g., Narnia Investments Pty Ltd)

hearing_year.description: year when the hearing began; use format YYYY (e.g., 2009)

judgment_year.description: year when the judgment was delivered; use format YYYY (e.g., 2009)

charges.description: list of specific legal accusations or charges brought against the defendant (e.g., misleading conduct; price fixing; use a semicolon to separate multiple charges; leave empty if not applicable)

case_type.description: type of the case, choose one from [Criminal Case, Civil Case, Commercial Case, Administrative Case]; (e.g., Criminal Case)

verdict.description: court's decision, choose one from: [Guilty, Not Guilty, Others, Dismissed, Approved]; (e.g., Guilty)

legal_basis_num.description: Number of distinct legal statutes or codes cited in the judgment (e.g., 'Trade Practices Act 1974' counts as 1; enter an integer, e.g., 1)

case_number.description: Number of distinct precedent cases referenced in the judgment, including those cited, considered, discussed, or applied (e.g., 'Australian Competition and Consumer Commission v Rana' counts as 1; enter an integer, e.g., 1)

counsel_for_applicant.description: name of the applicant’s lawyer (e.g., Mr I Faulkner SC)

counsel_for_respondent.description: name of the respondent’s lawyer (e.g., Mr D Barclay)

fine_amount.description: total monetary amount of fines imposed in the case (include all fines, partial payments, and fines for multiple parties; leave empty if none; e.g., 250000)

legal_fees.description: total amount of legal fees awarded or imposed (sum all applicable fees; leave empty if none; e.g., 30000)

plaintiff_current_status.description: current occupation or type of the plaintiff (if an individual, write occupation; if multiple people, use the first individual's occupation; if an organization, write 'organization'; if a company, write 'company'; if a government body, write 'government'; leave empty if unknown; e.g., company)

defendant_current_status.description: current occupation or type of the defendant (rules same as for plaintiff; e.g., government)

evidence.description: whether evidence was provided (1 if yes, 0 if none; e.g., 1)

first_judge.description: whether it was the first judgment (1 if yes, 0 if none; e.g., 1)
